guard command nondeterminaci and formal deriv of program so callguard command ar introduc as a build block for alternand repetit construct that allow nondeterminist program compon for whichat least the activ evok but possibl even the finalstate is not necessarili uniqu determin by the initi statefor the formal deriv of program express in term ofthese construct a calculu will be shown cacm august 1975dijkstra e w program languag sequenc primit program semant programlanguag semant nondeterminaci case construct repetit termin correct proof derivof program program methodolog 4 20 4 22 ca750803 jbjanuari 6 1978 4 46 pm 249 4 2732 2544 2732 272 4 2732 1102 4 2732 1109 42732 1140 4 2732 1188 4 2732 1306 4 27321464 4 2732 1491 4 2732 1767 4 2732 17814 2732 1787 4 2732 1949 4 2732 321 42732 2021 4 2732 2059 4 2732 2126 4 27322222 4 2732 2227 4 2732 2315 4 2732 23264 2732 2470 4 2732 435 4 2732 437 42732 463 4 2732 483 4 2732 491 4 27322732 4 2732 2732 4 2732 2865 4 2732 28964 2732 2943 4 2732 560 4 2732 583 42732 3014 4 2732 3068 4 2732 3073 4 27323077 4 2732 3143 4 2732 627 4 2732 6314 2732 632 4 2732 642 4 2732 644 42732 653 4 2732 680 4 2732 761 4 2732762 4 2732 763 4 2732 123 4 2732 1404 2732 919 4 2732 989 4 2732 196 52732 1834 5 2732 2732 5 2732 2732 5 27322732 5 2732 2896 5 2732 2972 5 2732 30375 2732 3039 5 2732 3043 5 2732 3073 52732 196 6 2732 970 6 2732 1834 6 27322204 6 2732 2597 6 2732 2597 6 2732 27236 2732 2723 6 2732 2732 6 2732 2732 62732 2732 6 2732 2732 6 2732 2732 6 27322732 6 2732 2738 6 2732 2896 6 2732 29276 2732 799 6 2732
